text: Lake Shore Drive is a freeway-standard expressway in Chicago, Illinois. It runs along the shore of Lake Michigan. The highway passes Navy Pier all the through 875 North Michigan Avenue. The drive is a dangerous area during blizzards. The drive was named Leif Ericson Drive (after Leif Ericson) until it was renamed in 1946. ==References== ==Other websites== * Lake Shore Drive Redux from ForgottenChicago.com * The Campaign to Depave Lake Shore Drive * Historic, Current & Average Travel Times For Lake Shore Drive Category:Roads in Chicago
